edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.paxosutil

Class IntegerMap<NodeIDType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.paxosutil.IntegerMap<NodeIDType>
  • Type Parameters:
    NodeIDType - This class maintains a map of NodeIDType objects to integers, and provides some convenience methods to go back and forth between collections of the two kinds. It is synchronized because PaxosManager and Messenger (used by the BatchLogger thread in AbstractPaxosLogger) use this class.

    public class IntegerMap<NodeIDType>
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    V. Arun

      • allInt

        public static final boolean allInt()
        Returns:
        True if no non-integer node ID was ever encountered. If so, we can be slightly more efficient in messaging by avoiding node to int conversion and back.

      • get
